授業目的: The course aims at strengthening your confidence in using English for communication. By the end of this term, you should have improved your skills in written and oral communication in English.
到達目標: 1) The student can compose and communicate a clearly formulated and persuasive message orally and in writing. 2) The student masters the paragraph format and can present, analyze and discuss information in an academically acceptable format. 3) In oral presentations the participant can convey her/his messages to others.
授業方法: 注　学院の方針に従って授業は教室で行うが、認められるニーズあれば、平行同時双方向型オンライン授業で実施予定だ。

第1回: Welcome back. We start with "the next" chapter in the textbook. Expect to cover one chapter per week.
第2回: Assingment and work with an oral pair presentation in dialogue form. Students will be paired up and assigned one of the Sustainable Development Goals. The presentation must be 15 minutes long and compare how Japan  and India or another developing country deal with that specific goal. Besides the dialogue, the group must submit a manuscript that includes documentation on the sources used.
第6回:
SDGs in Japan and a developing country - a pair dialogue.
In this and the following classes, 4 or 5 groups will give a fifteen-minute dialogue folowed by time for the audience to write a short review. The talks will be recorded on video. Speakers will get a copy of their performance and must submit a reflection on it in writing.
第7回: SDGs in Japan and a developing country - a pair dialogue.
第8回: SDGs in Japan and a developing country - a pair dialogue.
第9回: SDGs in Japan and a developing country - a pair dialogue.

If for some reason I find you are copying text, the first time you will be warned, the next you will fail. The internet is full of useful and useless information, including ready-made essays. It is fine to learn from such information, but unless you are the original author, you cannot get the credit for it.
